synopsis.text:
Fernando Lovelace, the new head of the prestigious Lovelace family, seeks help from the ruthless mercenaries of the Lagoon Company in Roanapur, Thailand. His beloved family member and former assassin turned maid, Roberta, is on a merciless rampage to avenge the brutal murder of the family's patriarch. With her military expertise and unstoppable determination, Roberta's bloody quest for vengeance threatens to disrupt the delicate balance of power in Roanapur, drawing the attention of international forces such as the CIA and KGB.

As the Lagoon Company attempts to rein in Roberta's chaos, they find themselves caught in the crossfire between her and the United States Army, who are believed to be responsible for the assassination. With the body count rising and the stakes higher than ever, the crew must navigate the treacherous waters of global politics and Roanapur's criminal underworld to prevent an all-out war. Can they put an end to Roberta's vengeful crusade before it's too late, or will the city be painted red with blood?
